document.full_text: the new york times named jill abramson as its first woman executive editor, putting her in control of one the world's most respected newspapers as the industry struggles to keep advertisers and readers.
document.title: new york times names abramson first woman editor
lines_and_colors: the new york times named jill abramson as its first woman executive editor, putting her in control of one the world's most respected newspapers as the industry struggles to keep advertisers and readers.
